Reviews.Title: “Basic Hotel and fit for purpose for a 1 night weekend trip”
Reviews.Author: PerantauDunia
Reviews.Content: stayed friends hotel weekend price paid â‚¬100 minute booking value summary youre looking location dont plan spending lot time hotel adequate shouldnt expect luxury catered chain hotel mind hotel fine wouldnt stay 3 nights comfortable stay consider nh doelen nh hotel chain canal sometimes similar rates according people spoke amsterdam looks nicer hotel stay thats booked pros cons below pros location excellent price walking distance decent size youre staying cons 1 bed comfortable pillows thin thicker posed 2 front desk reception wasnt curtious wasnt rude 3 street noise facing canal hear street noise light sleepers 4 blackout blinds curtains total darkness sleep

Reviews.Title: “Great location - basic hotel”
Reviews.Author: spannerhc
Reviews.Content: hotel location perfect wandering amsterdam yes bit bit noisy due traffic people walking centre amsterdam clean twin stayed accommodate people trip staff friendly breakfast decent recommend dont expect

Reviews.Title: “Great Location”
Reviews.Author: Kieron H
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel trip amsterdam perfect read lot reviews hand chose location absolutely superb map potentially bit main square literally five minute walk theres square roughly minute lots bars eat fantastic youre time airport roughly 20 minutes train city centre easy ticket staff friendly train station arrives probably 15 minutes walk city centre hotel location centre ice bar heineken museum red light district etc walking distance trams frequent cheap terms hotel relatively basic sleep medium sized beds comfy curtains kept light couldnt plus window overlooked canal outside hotel sit watch boats buy morning stay downside price paid left late book

Reviews.Title: “A very disappointing experience”
Reviews.Author: Robbie M
Reviews.Content: disappointing tiny dark climb bed tiny bathroom sit reading lights broken shower hot water morning change unacceptable told hotel booked feel cheated paid 3star definitely staff didnt care wouldnt help charged 3star prices hotel offered 118 leave immediately bother hotel

Reviews.Title: “Great location”
Reviews.Author: nainai99
Reviews.Content: hotel agreat location minutes rembrandt square fab drinks evening prefer bright red lights minutes walk stayed 4 people pretty basic odd shape meant beds situated corner didnt watch sleep id request facing canal view staff hotel friendly id definitely recommend buget hotel central location

Reviews.Title: “Clean and in a great location.”
Reviews.Author: cmglin
Reviews.Content: stayed annex building 11 corner hotel view canal bigger hotel building clean huge windows chairs table spacious amsterdam guy checked helpful bathroom looked newish downside sometimes smell drain shower

Reviews.Title: “very basic but idealy located”
Reviews.Author: madziusssia
Reviews.Content: charming hotel heart city walking distance popular weve stayed canal basic bed dated bathroom chair table difference understand wouldnt youre looking warm clean bed roof perfect option

Reviews.Title: “Terrible Hotel but Super Location”
Reviews.Author: Kikibooboutique
Reviews.Content: price am charge 300 euros 2 night stay practically walk everytime move round bed shower shower joke eaves buliding low meant shower sitting 3 star hotel refurbished tired 90s decor recommend location superb cafes beside hotel friendly food excellent

Reviews.Title: “Good all rounder, great on location”
Reviews.Author: andrewswainwright
Reviews.Content: recently enjoyed trip amsterdam girlfriend friends queens day booked hotel people site scouring reviews stay contrast opinions wondered people differing experiences consider fairly balanced comes accommodation honestly hotel absolutely perfect isnt five star luxury doesnt claim youre looking decent clean serviced fantastically located hotel admittedly wasnt cheapest suspect premium justifiable simply based location furthermore booked queens day hotels charging odds secure base amsterdam round city perfect plus spending time strong negative doing city break

Reviews.Title: “Great location for your first trip to Amsterdam”
Reviews.Author: aandriolli
Reviews.Content: price usual amsterdam location excellent visiting tourists able walking tourist sights nearby internet access available expensive morning shower didnt hot water air conditioner unexpectedly hot days 10 eur breakfast honest

Reviews.Title: “clean and central, but not as good as their website”
Reviews.Author: Callanish
Reviews.Content: found hotel listed york times list budget hotels amsterdam minute trip glad cost 95 euros night capital city fair location excellent clean plenty hot water hairdryer bathroom staff courteous slept mean makes london hotel look palatial despite fabulous photos promotion canal views website promotional materials hotel single canal view single travellers sent tiny curtains closed youll looking elses hotel window breakfast basic typical european budget hotels perfectly acceptable definitely worth 10 euros charged cafe corner excellent food quiet drink youre realistic expect clean comfortable budget hotel youre travelling solo opt single prepared view website little money suspect deal especially offseason

Reviews.Title: “Don't bother”

Reviews.Content: wasnt reviews speaking etc ive amsterdam read hotel charge night grim ruined 1980s chipboard furniture tv set size shoe box bath close eaves wasnt actually shower lying extra â‚¬10 breakfast uncomfortable bed freakishly sized 34 width duvets completed disappointing picture amsterdam fine town glorious hotels isnt
